Package pl.polsl.model

Class LottoBase

java.lang.Object
pl.polsl.model.LottoBase
public class LottoBase extends Object
This class stores the single lotto numbers and informations about their frequency and percents
Version:
2.0
Author:
Piotr Benio

  • Constructor Details

    • LottoBase

      public LottoBase()
      Constructor. Creates all containers and sets frequency and percentage hashmap key values as numbers from 1 to 40. The value behind each key is 0, beacuse the main base is now empty

    • DoNewRandomWinningSetsProcedure

      public void DoNewRandomWinningSetsProcedure(int amount, int... args) throws NumberFormatException
      This method will generate new winning sets and update both database and frequency base. Sets will be generated randomly and percentage container will be updated.
      Parameters:
      amount - is an amount of new winning sets that are to be generated
      args - is an additional amount or amounts of sets to generate
      Throws:
      NumberFormatException

    • setFilename

      public void setFilename(String name)
      Sets filename (database) name.
      Parameters:
      name - of the file that will be read

    • getFilename

      public String getFilename()
      getter for filename
      Returns:
      filename string

    • getDataFromDatabase

      public void getDataFromDatabase() throws LottoBaseException, FileNotFoundException
      This method opens the database from txt file, reads and adds new numbers to database File name is set as the filename variable to make sure the right file is to be opened. Reader will read the values from database and put them into new winning set. The counter increments after every loaded lotto value. After getting 6 of them, winning numbers set will be put in database and frequency base. Then it will be cleared and the counter value will be set as 0.In the end, percentage container will also be updated. If any error occures during database opening, FileNotFoundException will be thrown.
      Throws:
      LottoBaseException - will be thrown if the value from database will not be in range between 1 or 40.
      FileNotFoundException - will be thrown when file can't be found
